thread.title: Joseph

author: Joseph
title: Joseph
text: I had wanted to know about Apricot Power and even Know about Becomming an Afliiate I Had a Chat Session with one of Thier Representitives , A Very Pleasent Suprise Instead of Talking to a computer I was Chatting with a Live Person Vincent , He is a Very Courteous, Professional , and a Great Representative of This Company. His Knowledge , and Personable Attitude is Very Remarkable , And He is Without a Doubt a Credit to This Company
